channel.title: Identity-Theory on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt
channel.description: Recent content in Identity-Theory on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt

item.title: Philosophical Theories of Consciousness: A Comparative Map
item.description: A long-form comparative guide to major philosophical theories of consciousness, including history, epiphenomenalism, functionalism, emergence, identity theory, key thinkers, and unresolved questions.
